name: Revival Of Cleo
description:
Level designer, UI/UX designer and story writer – Darijan Bogdanovic (https://prozzo86.itch.io/revival-of-cleo)

Programmer and animation programmer – Ivan Ivkovic 

Mentor: Cwekii Dominik Cvetkovski

Control Sheme

The keyboard is used for movement, pause and quit. 

The mouse is used for targeting, attacking and navigation.

Keyboard:

W - move forward

A - move left

S - move back

D - move right

Shift - run

Q  - change hand

G  - throw granade

Space   - jump

ESC - escape/pause

Mouse:

Left button  - attack, shoot

Scroll wheel - change weapon

Right button - aim

Please leave your comments or questions below in the comment section.

Enjoy!
